## ProductJsonLdProps.gtin12 property

The GTIN-12 code of the product, or the product to which the offer refers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
gtin12?: string | string[];
```

## Remarks

The GTIN-12 is the 12-digit GS1 Identification Key composed of a U.P.C. Company Prefix, Item Reference, and Check Digit used to identify trade items. See [GS1 GTIN Summary](http://www.gs1.org/barcodes/technical/idkeys/gtin) for more details.
